archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.5.5a: a) performing rigorous monitoring of internal and external network traffic to help identify unauthorised scanning, probing and enumeration activities, and misuse of technical infrastructure
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
